summary: This document outlines the appraisal delivery and waiver of waiting period for a mortgage loan application with Fifth Third Mortgage. It details the borrower's rights regarding appraisal reports and the options available for waiving the three-day waiting period before closing.
keyFacts: The document is related to a mortgage loan application with Fifth Third Mortgage.
Borrowers are entitled to receive a copy of any appraisal report or valuation concerning their property.
Borrowers can choose to waive their right to receive appraisal reports at least three days before closing.
The document includes options for borrowers to either waive or not waive their rights regarding appraisal report delivery.
Fifth Third Mortgage is identified as an Equal Housing Lender.
